The study evaluate effect CBT RT psychological adaptation ( include measure negative adaptation [ negative affect social disruption ] positive adaptation [ positive affect benefit find ] ) 6-month 12-month follow-up . The study also evaluate effect CBT RT physiological adaptation ( include level PM serum cortisol T-helper-type 1 ( Th1 ) cytokine [ interleukin-2 , IL-2 , interferon-gamma , IFN-g , production anti-CD3 stimulation peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMCs ) .
